text: Thiago Martinelli da Silva (born January 14, 1980 in Jundiaí), is a Brazilian central defender. He last played for Audax-SP. ==Honours== *Brazilian League (3rd division): 2001 *São Paulo State League: 2004 ==Contract== *16 July 2007 to 15 July 2010 (Cruzeiro) (Terminated contract) ==External links== * * CBF * sambafoot * Guardian Stats Centre * zerozero.pt * soccerterminal * centralbrasileirao * Thiago é o novo reforço do Cruzeiro Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Paulista Futebol Clube players Category:Associação Desportiva São Caetano players Category:Cruzeiro Esporte Clube players Category:Grêmio Osasco Audax Esporte Clube players Category:Cerezo Osaka players Category:J2 League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Japan Category:Brazilian people of Italian descent Category:Association football defenders
title: Thiago Martinelli
